title: LeggyPeggy
cardDesc: LeggyPeggy is an exhilarating and cooperative game where two players take on the roles of a highly advanced robot and a plucky little girl armed with a powerful weapon.
description: LeggyPeggy is an exhilarating and cooperative game where two players take on the roles of a highly advanced robot and a plucky little girl armed with a powerful weapon.

Together, you must use your unique strengths and abilities to overcome challenging parkour obstacles and defeat enemies. With fast-paced gameplay, exciting challenges, and an engaging story, Leggy Peggy is a game that requires communication and cooperation to conquer the track.
Are you ready to join forces with Leggy and Peggy?

title: Diffuseum
description: Made for AI in Games Summer School 2022 Game Jam. This is a special gallery where the guests inspire the art. There is just one problem, the gallerist forgot to put up the signs!

title: Soggy Story
description: Made for Unwrap Game Jam 2023. Steer your little fragile paperboat to safety, to deliver the letter, that it contains.
